caption: This place is absolutely awesome. Great dishes and pizza. The prices are a bargain for the quality you get. Service is great. I’m becoming a regular. All I see is happy faces and Kous Kous, yes it’s a name, our server, made the experience very enjoyable.

Quality service, arguably the best wings in Miami. Pizza is hugeee for the price with wide variety of toppings. Location is beautiful. Honestly everything on their menu is amazing, if you like dessert make sure to try the Tres Leches! Really get what you pay for and more. Will leave satisfied I guarantee!
Sitting here right now, enjoying the best aperol spritz ever (see a pic), and waiting for our delicious pizza. Ppl around are pretty happy and chill. Like the vibe a lot!

INCREDIBLE pizza. I grew up on Connecticut and New York pizza and I have to say that the pizza here is the best I have ever had. Finally, a good pizza joint on the beach! Fun atmosphere, thin crust, delicious cheese, great staff!
Delicious Evertng is Great & The host serve Amazyn😊

My husband and I enjoyed a delicious lunch at Pizette Miami yesterday near Lincoln Road on Miami Beach. We sat outside at a comfortable table distanced from other diners. The staff were friendly, accomodating and attentive. I loved the chef …
Best pizza I've ever had

Best Pizza in South Beach hands down!!! From the tasty food to the ambiance it doesn’t get any better! My boyfriend’s a huge critic when it comes to pizza and he was especially impressed! We ordered the Cesar salad to start and I just …
Calzones are really tasty, service a bit slow.
Food is mediocre Gazpacho soup-  too sweet Grilled veggies- ok i guess but a bit tasteless Beet salad - no dressing so flavorless Meat lasagna- dry and Service - was ok
BEST NY thin crust pizza anywhere!   Great wine, great atmosphere and great food!
Loved it! Great atmosphere, service... And of course.. food. Great value for money too. Totally recommend. Had a great time.

Excellent experience. Their original tomato sauce was great! We enjoyed the pizza and few appetizers.  (The only disappointment was that the bathroom was dirty. They fixed it right away but it reduced my appetite for sure.)
Delicious food at reasonable prices. Great service!
(Translated by Google) Very good pizza, but high prices  (Original) Muy buena pizza, pero precios altos

Is okay
Great pizza. Better to eat there, pizza is thin and tastes better hot.
Very good ☺️☺️
Amazing place ! Best pizza i ever had in miami. Staff is amazing . And this french/Italian combination is just perfect . Happy hour 6$ a glass of french wine 8$ whole pie ♥️

The  Pizza in this place was extremely good, I am a good judge of Pizza. The ingredients were of high quality and cooked well. The employees were attentive, polite and very helpful in going over the food and wine selection. I was shocked …

Horrible Margarita, drop of sauce, a drop of cheese. That's it. Dry, $23.98 for what? He said%50 off next one. Sorry at 74 from NYC and world traveler now living in South Beach, so sorry they moved near us. Good luck eating there and they don't care. They say they are great.

This place is really lovely.  I had a fantastic pizza that was huge for just me.  Definitely would recommend for different styles of pizza. Happy hour from 4-6 with discounted drinks and some menu items.
Yum

The goat cheese and honey pizza struck us as odd, but we took a gamble to try it and were so glad we did! The pepperoni pizza was great too. The service and atmosphere were really nice, and we can't wait to go back! The outdoor dining area is really nice too!
Great for late night Pizza cravings!!!
Amazing! Jason is the best! Great happy hour! The door and service are perfect!
Very very bad service. Is not an Italian restaurant
Great service
Great food and great service.
Delicious, authentic Italian pizza! Kind server and beautiful atmosphere.
Pizza was a 7.9. Waitress was out to lunch. Decent overall. Would go back.
Well I didn't eat anything but it smells fabulous

The food and location to our apt is fantastic. Our server, Monica, was attentive and very pleasant. All staff helped each other and our food was hot & wine was flowing. Mehdi (mgr?) made sure to check in on us and saw to it that the entire restaurant (we were outside dining) was ticking like a Swiss clock. Nice job all around.
As good as many places in Italy, I really love this place and will make sure I go whenever I am in miami beach

Fantastic pizza cooked just right. The fresh parmesan right from the wheel is a nice touch. They cook it with a nice crisps and all the toppings are fresh and delicious. You'll be happy you decided to give it a try.
Great place to eat pizza.
(Translated by Google) Delicious pizza and good service.  (Original) Pizza deliciosa y buena atención.
Favorite place to eat on South Beach

Wow! This place is amazing. I have nothing but good things to say. I genuinely feel as if this is authentic Italian pizza. I highly recommend if you’re here as a tourist or looking for a new pizza joint. The atmosphere is a 10/10 as well. I recommend the pepperoni and the vegetarian pizza!
Excellent place!

Very tasty and affordable menu.  Most of the appetizers are served in generous portions (with the exception of the meatballs).  The small pizza was also ginormous for a “pizzette” but was very light and enjoyable.  My only disappointment is that they don’t offer any traditional entrees.

3 stars is a bit higher than deserved for our experience, but we do want to give this place another chance.  We are locals and really wanted to like this place.  The service was friendly and the menu a decent value, but at the end of the …
This place is delicious
Great food, great price, great service

Enjoyed the service and food here. A few of my girlfriends were in town visiting and stumbled upon this sweet eatery. From the scenery to service EVERYTHING was perfect! Jason gave the BEST service in South Florida!
A unique South Beach experience - a nice chilled out vibe with great outdoor seating - pizza menu is authentic with a French fusion that’s hard to find anywhere else - staff are great and friendly
BEST pizza I have ever had and great service!! No idea how this only has 4.7 stars. Glad we stopped in and sad this was only a vacation stop!
Top place in Miami. Great pizza and very friendly staff.
great pizza but very slow
Pizza was cold *not their fault,  I simply waited to eat it*, however even though it was cold, it still somehow was the best pizza I ever had.
Great Pizza with friendly service. Good menú selection besides Pizza. Definitely recommend this place for lunch or dinner.
(Translated by Google) Very good food and attention  (Original) Muy buena la comida y atención
Easily the best pizza I've ever had in Miami Fantastic crust, just the right about of sauce and fresh delicious cheese. Will definitely be coming back.
(Translated by Google) Very good food! We loved the place!  (Original) Muy buena comida!Nos encanto el lugar!

The owners are the nicest people, the decoration is adorable and the food is always high quality and tasty. I go to Pizzette regularly with my hubby and different friends everytime. A lot of them have return on their own ! YOU MUST GO
Worst pizza I’ve had in a while.  I ordered delivery.  The restaurant is 5 blocks from my house.  The pizza was ice cold.  The pizza crust was like cardboard!  Never again!

We came here about a month ago and the food was delicious. It's located on the other side of Lincoln Road pass Alton. I actually like this area because its quieter than the main strip. It's fairly a small restaurant but well designed. They …

Leider war sich die Bedienung nicht einig wer welchen Tisch bedienen musste weshalb unsere Bestellungen zum Teil unter gingen.
Pizzette is a Rare gem in the heart ❤ of Miami Beach. Is very cozy with a friendly environment... Definitely a spot you must visit...

caption: Very nice food and nice place
Absolutely amazing restaurant! Ask for Paulina. The owner is also amazing. Pizza tastes like straight from Italy! Highly recommend. 10 Stars!!!

Awesome place from the cosy & warm ambiance to the quality of service and excellent food with more than fair price. Will go back often.
Good food
The best pizza
Excellent pizza and a really nice outdoor area to eat. Our server Veronica was great and funny and we look forward to returning often.
Some of the best thin crust home made pizza in south beach.  Decent wine list and has outdoor seating.
Delicious, perfectly seasoned, cheesed and Pepperonnied!! New word!!  Will order again !
Super fresh ingredients, amazing pizza.
Amazing pizza! Such a fun atmosphere too. Highly recommend!!!
Nice seating and delicious pizza!

I have to say, my experience here was top notch! The owners here are working as servers and whatever else needs to be done, they do!! I admire them for this reason plus the food is amazing-fresh and unbeatable quality!!! I love this place❤️👏
One of the best Italian restaurants. Took me to Italy indeed. Delicious food. Must try.
(Translated by Google) A 10 in everything.  (Original) Un 10 en todo.

I don’t understand how this place manages to stay in business. We ordered three different pizzas and the all were absolutely disgusting: cold, stale crust, ingredients were scarce...had my family not tried I would have left..owners should be ashamed of selling this type of food....horrible
Delicious!  Wonderful food & fantastic service!!!!
Wine and food tasty

My two star Is only because I took one pizza bufala for take out, and the bufala was completely cold, the tomato sauce wasn't good and the receipt didn't tell me that there was balsamic vinegar, that I hate it. Maybe I was unlike.....
Is the Best  pizza 5 more minute cooking

Excellent, small, comforting place for authentic Italian food. Ordered a large pepperoni pizza and the italata shareable salad and it was perfect. Service was quick and they have half off wine from 4-7(happy hour)
Excellent food, service and music. It's a really nice spot with a great vibe.

We so wanted to like this new restaurant in our neighborhood. We ordered a pizza and a salad, and both were totally mediocre at best. The pizza came ice cold with no sauce and the salad came with very little dressing.  Very sad indeed.   😔
Simply excellent !
Excellent new spot! Locals approved 😌
Stunning experience ! The pizzas are so yummy, the entrées are additionally flavorful. Incredible quality nourishment at a truly sensible cost.

The best !
Amazing pizza and food! Very causal but elegant setting! The service was impeccable! I’ll be back for sure!

They just opened and it is definitely my fave spot !!! Excellent service... the workers are very friendly and kind. They make u feel like I’m very important! THE FOOD, woooow !!! I was not expecting such a high,fresh, tasty... amazing food. …
Best little gem in Miami Beach! Simple, traditional, delicious and great price! Mehdi is such a warm and friendly welcomer! Amazing job guys!!
Amazing experience ! The pizzas are so yummy, the entrées are also delicious. Great quality food for a very reasonable price. The staff was also amazing, they gave us a great service 👌👌
Delicious Pizza

Everything is fabulous.  The apps are light, the cheeses and meats are hand selected and the pizza crust is out of this world.  Great and friendly service from a neighborhood gem that I hope sticks around for a long time.  Thanks guys.
Pizza was absolutely delicious I was not disappointed. Would go back.
Pizza was amazing soooooo delicious. Service was great. Can't wait to go back!!
Pizza was really good and I liked the location.
Great pizza and friendly service! For now you can bring your own bottle of wine or even beer and they will allow you to drink.
Best thin pizza ever! This place has been here for ages.
Amazing environment and very amiable service. The food was fresh and delicious. Will surely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and big meals. Keep it up

The brick oven, the red sofas, the open kitchen, and the beautiful terasse. That’s the recipe to an amazing emerging place. The pizzas are simply the best I ate in town, perfect crust. The salads and carpaccios are top level. Thanks pizette for the experience, I’ll be back soon ✌🏼
Best pizza in town !! Warm welcome from the team !
Great spot in the heart of South Beach. Delicious pizza, spectacular tiramisu, and amazing vibe. Super friendly stuff and honest prices. Definitively recommend!

I stopped by Pizzette today on Lincoln Rd this afternoon. Pizza was beyond delish and Caprese Tomatoes San Marzano, mozzarella di Bufala, pesto was super fresh, had to have dessert and it was HUGE   and Mehdi brought us out a Tiramisu on the house and it was soooooooo good!!!    service was outstanding. “I’ll be back”!!!

This is the best place to get pizza on the beach! Recently opened up, Pizzette takes me to the pizza in Napoli, with south of France vibes. The mix between the pizza, atmosphere, and customer service is unparalleled. I will definitely become a regular.

Guys don’t miss out it’s just the BEST PIZZAS in town !!! Amazing service, delicious Pizzas everything is fresh ... Not to mention the carpaccios ... we had the Octopus Carpaccio it’s the most tasty we ever had. We are sitting here as I am …
Simply the best pizza in Miami Beach. We had the Regina and it was amazing. Thin crunchy crust and you can taste the great quality ingredients. Highly recommend this awesome place.
Good quality, good spot
The best pizzeria in town
Pizzette is finally open!! You must try the Pizza Prosciutto Crudo! Great staff & food.Highly recommend
It’s amazing place with beautiful decoration and the staff so sweet and the pizza 🍕 is Amazing 😍❤️
We ordered a Margherita and a Pepperoni. The crust was crisp and flavorful. The topppings worked together beautifully. Will be ordering again.
Awesome new pizzeria in town with fresh products and a New York style decoration Affordable price amazing pizza and super friendly staff
Excellent pizza, the ingredients are great quality. I will reorder again.
